content_html: Judges say India's aviation body was irresponsible to suggest through leaks to the media that pilot error had caused the disaster.
content_text: Judges say India's aviation body was irresponsible to suggest through leaks to the media that pilot error had caused the disaster.
summary: Judges say India's aviation body was irresponsible to suggest through leaks to the media that pilot error had caused the disaster.
title: Air India crash aftermath handled 'irresponsibly', says court
